verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: After weeks of warming relations] , [ARG0: North Korea] [ARGM-MNR: abruptly] [V: postponed] [ARG1: scheduled talks with South Korea] [ARGM-PRP: to protest U.S - South Korean military exercises] . But the Trump administration said it was continuing to plan for next month 's summit with Kim Jong Un and downplayed the North Korean statement .

But the Trump administration said it was continuing to plan for next month 's summit with Kim Jong Un and downplayed the North Korean statement .
